mapper.select: select testid , testname , to_char(testdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as testdate , to_char(testlimit, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as testlimit , totalpoints from lms_test ORDER BY testid desc

SELECT testid , testname , totalpoints , to_char(testdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as testdate , to_char(testlimit, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as testlimit , totalpoints FROM lms_test WHERE testid = #{testid}
SELECT * FROM lms_testpaper_list WHERE memberid = #{memberid} AND testid = #{testid}
SELECT asnum , testid , memberid , totalscore , (SELECT membername FROM lms_member m WHERE t.memberid = m.memberid) membername , checked FROM lms_testpaper_list t WHERE testid = #{testid}

SELECT tl.memberid as "testpaperList.memberid", tl.testid as "testpaperList.testid", tl.asnum AS "testpaperList.asnum", tl.totalscore AS "testpaperList.totalscore", tl.checked AS "testpaperList.checked", t.testname AS "test.testname", t.testdate as "test.testdate", t.testlimit as "test.testlimit" FROM lms_testpaper_list tl JOIN lms_test t ON tl.testid = t.testid WHERE tl.memberid = #{memberid}
SELECT testid FROM lms_testpaper_list WHERE asnum = #{asnum}
mapper.update: UPDATE lms_testpaper_list SET totalscore = ( SELECT SUM(points) FROM lms_test_answer WHERE asnum = #{asnum} ) WHERE asnum = #{asnum}
UPDATE lms_testpaper_list SET checked = 'complete' WHERE asnum = #{asnum}
mapper.select: SELECT asnum FROM lms_test_answer WHERE answernum = #{answernum}
